akas: Beyblade: Metal Masters World-wide (English title) (second season title)
akas from release info: Beyblade: Metal Masters World-wide (English title) (second season title)

-1.title: The Legend and the Evil Combine
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Maiorita Pegashisu
1.plot: Newcomer Gingka saves Kenta from the Face Hunters but then is challenged to a one hundred to one battle.

2.title: Reône no kiba!
2.plot: Before Gingka's new friend Madoka can finish fixing his broken bey Pegasus, he uses it to fight Kyoya and manages to win.

3.title: Vorufu no yabou!
3.plot: Kenta challenges Gingka to a battle; Kyoya is challenged to battle Doji and loses so as agreed, must leave with him to train.

4.title: Tosshin! Buru pawâ!
4.plot: Doji presents Benkei with the powerful Beyblade, Dark Bull so he can defeat Gingka.

5.title: Fukushuu no Kyansâ
5.plot: When a crab-obsessed villain named Tetsuya Watarigani kidnaps Madoka, Gingka must battle him to save her.

6.title: Akuario no chousen
6.plot: Hikaru Hasama issues a challenge to battle Gingka with Benkei's help but, Kenta poses as Gingka and fights her instead.

7.title: Hissatsu Tengi da! Sajitario
7.plot: Benkei trains Kenta to face Hikaru again; Madoka gives Kenta a bey part to help him create a new special move, which he uses to defeat Hikaru.

8.title: Merushii no kiken na wana
8.plot: Doji sends Kyoya to Wolf Canyon to prove his worth.

9.title: Reoone no gyakushuu
9.plot: Kyoya returns from Wolf Canyon and battles Benkei, destroying the warehouse they're in.

10.title: Gekitou! Ginga VS Kyouya
10.plot: Gingka battles Kyoya and Kyoya creates a tornado that rips through the city which inadvertently summons Gingka's friends to cheer him on.

11.title: Uorufu o oe!
11.plot: Gingka and the gang arrive at the Dark Nebula and are assaulted with a bey storm from above.

12.title: Sennyuu! Daaku Nebyura no shiro
12.plot: The gang are met with traps set by Merci on their way to confront Doji. When Gingka makes it, Doji asks him to join forces with him. When he refuses, a fierce battle ensues.

13.title: Erudorago, kakusei!
13.plot: Gingka battles his long lost nemesis Ryuga...but his anger gets in the way of winning.

14.title: Ryuusei no kioku
14.plot: Through flashback, we learn about Gingka's father, Ryo, who originally had the bey Pegasus and was defeated by Ryuga and lightning L-Drago.

15.title: Nazo no hyouma
15.plot: The gang set out to find Gingka in his home town but are faced with challenges along the way, including a mysterious traveler named Hyoma.

16.title: Kareinaru Ariesu
16.plot: On their way to Gingka's village, the gang is tested by Hyoma who reveals he is an old friend of Gingka's.

17.title: Hakugin no Pegashisu
17.plot: Finally arriving in the village, Gingka is not there but a wise, talking dog named Hokuto is; Gingka climbs a mountain to obtain a scroll that may have the key to his defeating Ryuga.

18.title: Midori no jigoku
18.plot: Hyoma and Gingka show the gang their beyblading stadiums of the past; Hyoma challenges Gingka to a new battle and it's not like it's ever been before.

19.title: Taggu batoru o kouryakuseyo!
19.plot: Benkei and Kenta learn how to change parts on their beys which make their beys even stronger, especially for the Aquatic Tag Team Tournament they enter.

20.title: Kaimaku! Sabaibaru batoru
20.plot: Gingka and his friends go to the remote Beyblade Island to participate in the intense Survival Battle competition.

21.title: Kotou no senshitachi
21.plot: The Survival Battle continues and it's down to the wire with eight competitors remaining...who will win?

22.title: Senritsu no ribera
22.plot: In the jaw-dropping finale of Survival Battle, everyone is surprised when Kyoya and Gingka are knocked out and the winner is...the new kid named Yu.

23.title: Batoru burêdâzu e no michi
23.plot: As the winner of the Endurance Battle, Yu is granted his wish: to have a Battle Bladers, the biggest beyblade competition in the world.

24.title: Utsukushiki Akuira
24.plot: Battles heat up as the bladers earn points for entry into the Battle Bladers competition; Gingka meets a new rival, Tsubasa, who tests his strength.

25.title: Sunaipaa Kapurikoone
25.plot: Kyoya comes across a calculating opponent Tobio, aka Captain Capri, whose moves appear erratic but not unstoppable by Kyoya.

26.title: Yami ni mau tsubasa
26.plot: Tsubasa proves his worthiness as a blader and joins forces with Doji's Dark Nebula Organization.

27.title: Rannyuu! Charenji macchi
27.plot: The competition to make it into Battle Bladers heats up with Yu battling Hyoma and Tsubasa battling Kenta.

28.title: Dâku Kyansâ no kanikani daisakusen
28.plot: As everyone gears up for Battle Bladers, the crab-obsessed Tetsuya is up to his usual tricks defeating everyone...except Gingka.

29.title: Kenta to Sora
29.plot: Kenta befriends a new blader, Sora, who has amazing power but no control; Sora copies Gingka's special move, but cannot pull it off.

30.title: Ayashiki Paishîzu
30.plot: Gingka is pushed to the limits when he enters an important challenge match and faces a self-claimed magician named Ryutaro.

31.title: Futago no Jemiosu
31.plot: Four battles go on in four different stadiums as the competition heats up to make it into Battle Bladers.

32.title: Arashi no batoru roiyaru
32.plot: In an exciting challenge match for Battle Bladers, six bladers are pitted against each other at the same time.

33.title: Fenikkusu no chikai
33.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

34.title: Kagayake Birugo!
34.plot: Gingka has to create a new special move when battling his new opponent Teru whose former ballet skills make him an incredible blader.

35.title: Eru Dorago shidou
35.plot: Tsubasa sneaks into the Dark Nebula but he is caught by Doji who makes him battle many Dark Nebula bladers to earn his freedom.

36.title: Hikisakareta Tsubasa
36.plot: Tsubasa is almost defeated by Ryuga in an intense battle until Phoenix comes to the rescue; Gingka fights Tobio in a stadium of moving walls.

37.title: Moudoku Esukorupio
37.plot: When a gang led by Busujima takes over their stadium, Kenta and Sora have to battle hard to get it back.

38.title: Hashire Ginga
38.plot: Even though Gingka is in a panic to win back enough points to enter Battle Bladers, he gives up a final challenge match to help his friends win against Tsubasa.

39.title: Gekitotsu! Fenikkusu vs Pegashisu
39.plot: Gingka wins against Phoenix, leading Phoenix to return his pointer to him with enough points to enter Battle Bladers; Tsubasa reveals he has been working for the WBBA.

40.title: Go! Batoru bureidâzu
40.plot: Battle Bladers begins but turns out Doji is in charge.

41.title: Sâpento no kyoufu
41.plot: Hyoma must battle an unknown blader, Reiji from the Dark Nebula, who uses a Poison Serpent to take him down.

42.title: Doragon no seisai
42.plot: The gang nurse Hikaru to health after her defeat by Ryuga; Yu is forced to battle Reiji to see if he can stay with the Dark Nebula and the battle ends in a huge explosion.

43.title: Shikumareta taisen
43.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

44.title: Takusareta omoi
44.plot: Kenta battles Reji for Yu and confuses him by switching Sagittario and Yu's bey Libra's performance tips.

45.title: Gyakushuu no Akuira
45.plot: After a fierce battle with Ryuga, Tsubasa is eliminated from Battle Bladers; Ryuga issues a challenge to Gingka who readily accepts.

46.title: Kiera Ribura
46.plot: Battle Bladers Semi-Finals pits Gingka against Reiji; Doji takes Yu away so Hyoma and Kenta go to the Dark Nebula to save him.

47.title: Hagane no kizuna
47.plot: Gingka manages to defeat Reiji using a mirror to reflect his attacks back; Phoenix helps rescue Yu and defeats Doji in battle, only to reveal the two knew each other back in Koma Village.

48.title: Hikari to yami no shinjitsu
48.plot: The masked blader Phoenix is revealed to be Gingka's Father, Ryo who explains he went into hiding to fight the Dark Nebula; Ryuga saps Doji of his energy making Ryuga more powerful.

49.title: Gekisen! Shishi tai Ryuu
49.plot: Kyoya finally gets to battle Ryuga, determined to avenge Tsubasa who had become a close friend. After persuading Ryuga not to use his special move, it really looked like Kyoya could win.

50.title: Ikari no saishuukessen!
50.plot: In the first part of the finals, Ryuga builds a special arena for his match with Gingka.

51.title: Bureedaa no tamashii
51.plot: In a spirited finale, Gingka battles with a mutated version of Ryuga.

1.title: Densetsu o motomete
1.plot: Ryo, Gingka‰ЫЄs father, acts as Director of the new WBBA but the first tournament is disrupted by a blader named Masamune. Gingka meanwhile is on a quest to replace Storm Pegasus with a Legendary Bey sealed in the mountains near Koma Village. Gingka retrieves the bey in a cave and is challenged to battle by Masamune.

8.title: Daisan no otoko
8.plot: In the jaw-dropping finale of Survival Battle, everyone is surprised when Kyoya and Gingka are knocked out and the winner is...the new kid named Yu.

9.title: Kaimaku! Sekai taikai
9.plot: At a qualifying tournament to select representatives for the Beyblade World Championships, Gingka finds that he is already on the team and is not required to battle. He is disappointed but enjoys watching the spirited battles, which are capped off by a final between Yu and Masamune. Masamune emerges victorious and now there is only one spot left open on Team Japan.

10.title: Racheruta no ishi
10.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

13.title: Gokkan no chi Roshia
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

14.title: Souzetsu! Kanaami desumacchi!
14.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

15.title: Ribura shutsujin!
15.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

16.title: The Festival of Warriors
16.plot: The bladers find themselves in Greece where they must battle the European Union, aka Team Excalibur. Wales (from England) and Sophie (from France) provide protection for their leader Julian Konzern (from Italy) making it hard for Gingka?s team to break through.

22.title: The Third Match: On The Edge
22.plot: The third and tie breaking match between Gangan Galaxy and Wild Fang takes the form of a team battle with Yu and Tsubasa facing Benkei and Damoure. Tsubasa refuses to lose, but ends up channeling some dark forces to allow Gangan Galaxy to claim victory and move on to the next round.

23.title: The End of a Fierce Struggle!
23.plot: Team Africa and Team Japan continue their struggles, the director discusses the revelation of the return of the Darkness.

24.title: Shinobiyoru yami
24.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

25.title: The Axe of Destruction
25.plot: Chiyun battles Klaus in an elimination bout and despite his best efforts, Chiyun loses and Wang Hu Zhong are eliminated from the tournament. Meanwhile, Hyoma finds Ryuga.

26.title: The Dragon Emperor Returns
26.plot: Julian Konzern and Team Excalibur return to Italy, where Konzern is surprised to be challenged to a battle by Tsubasa. The battle is interrupted by the unexpected appearance of Ryuga and his new bey, Meteo L-Drago.

27.title: Exceed the Limit
27.plot: Team Gangan Galaxy travels to Italy for the tournament finals, where Masamune loses his match to Klaus of Team Excalibur. Gingka meanwhile battles his oldest rival, Ryuga.

28.title: Dark Eagle
28.plot: Tsubasa and Yu battle Wales and Sophie in the finals, with Tsubasa defeating both his own dark side and the opponents to claim victory. Gingka meanwhile receives valuable advice from Ryuga.

29.title: Gravity Destroyer
29.plot: Julian Konzern and Gingka meet in the final and deciding battle for the A Block of the Beyblade World Championships. In a close match, Gingka's Galaxy Pegasus defeats Konzern's Gravity Destroyer.

34.title: The Friend's Name is Zeo
34.plot: Team Gangan Galaxy arrives in the USA to watch the next matches in the Beyblade World Championships. Masamune meets old friends, and battles one, but they call it a draw and vow to fight another day.

35.title: Our Slogan Is Number 1
35.plot: Masamune finds his old friend Toby and through flashback we learn that they made a pact long ago to become the number one bladers in the world.

36.title: The Plot Thickens
36.plot: As Gingka and the rest of Gangan Galaxy visit the Dungeon Gym, Zeo battles Ryuga at HD Academy. Ryuga wins and Dr. Ziggurat tells him his plan for world domination.

37.title: The Compass of Fate Byxis
37.plot: Zeo undergoes the "Arrangement" process at Dr. Ziggurat's lab, and then challenges Masamune to a battle. The battle ends when Damian arrives and he destroys Tsubasa and Yu's blades and leaves the two bladers unconscious.

38.title: The Wicked Peacock Befall
38.plot: With Tsubasa and Yu in the hospital, the rest of Gangan Galaxy attends a match between Team Excalibur and Team Star Breaker. Jack battles Klaus, and his Evil Befall defeats Klaus' Grand Capricorn, a battle that leaves Klaus in a state of suspended animation.

39.title: The Guard Dog of Hades, Kerbecs
39.plot: Damian Hart and Julian Konzern battle in the Big Bang Bladers tournament but Damian makes it a best of three battle

40.title: The Furious DJ Battle
40.plot: Gangan Galaxy tries to pick a replacement member for the Final Battle, but Kenta, Team Wang Hu Zhong and Ryo are all disqualified. Blader DJ and the American DJ battle to see who will announce the final match, but their battle ends in a tie and they decide to announce it together.

41.title: The Final Countdown
41.plot: The final matches of the Beyblade World Championships begin and Zeo of Team Star Breaker battles Masamune of Team Gangan Galaxy. Dr. Ziggurat tells Zeo that if he loses, his friend Toby's medical treatments will be discontinued. A desperate and possessed Zeo defeats Masamune in a hard fought match.

42.title: The Dragon Emperor Descends
42.plot: Gingka is ready to face Jack in the second battle of the final round of the Beyblade World Championships but Ryuga suprises everyone when he shows up to take his place. Ryuga uses L-Drago to defeat Jack's Befall to even the match between Team Gangan Galaxy and Team Star Breaker.

43.title: Spirits Last Battle
43.plot: Ryo tells Team Gangan Galaxy that the US team, Star Breaker, consists of members that have artificially enhanced by Dr. Ziggurat. Damian and Gingka begin the final battle of the World Championships.

44.title: Showdown! Ginka vs. Damian
44.plot: Gingka battles Damian in the final battle as the Beyblade World Championships continues. Damian's Kerbecs starts strong, but Gingka's Pegasus rallies and defeats them and Team Gangan Galaxy become champions.

46.title: Charge! Hades City
46.plot: Gingka and his friends decide to go after Dr. Ziggurat, but they encounter Ziggurat's minions who use their beys to try and stop their progress. Gingka and his friends prevail, and a small group actually makes it aboard Ziggurat's Hades City, which is now flying through the air powered by Spiral Force.

47.title: The Fallen Emperor
47.plot: Gingka and his friends try to rescue Toby from the clutches of Dr. Ziggurat but are blocked by Julian Konzern. Wales and Sophie clear the way by battling their former partner, Julian, but they lose. Dashan then battles and defeats Julian but makes Julian realize that even in defeat, lessons can be learned in Beyblade.

1.title: Fragment of the Star
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: Legend Blader
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Kenta and Sora
4.plot: Kenta befriends a new blader, Sora, who has amazing power but no control; Sora copies Gingka's special move, but cannot pull it off.

8.title: The Oath of the Phoenix
8.plot: When Phoenix save Gingka's Bey Pointer from Tetsuya's claws, Gingka must battle Phoenix as a reward, and loses ALL his points.

10.title: L-Drago on the Move
10.plot: Tsubasa sneaks into the Dark Nebula but he is caught by Doji who makes him battle many Dark Nebula bladers to earn his freedom.

29.title: The God of Destruction's Revival!?
29.plot: In Pluto's lair in Mexico, the powers of the beys of some of the Legendary Bladers are used to begin the revival of Nemesis. The energy that this process emits alerts Gingka and his friends to the impending danger and they decide to head to Mexico to stop the revival before it's too late. Meanwhile Ryuga feels the power of Nemesis' revival too and plans to take the power for himself.

30.title: The Child of Nemesis
30.plot: Gingka and his friends have landed in Mexico and rush to try and stop Nemesis' Revival. Inside the temple, Rago, the Child of the Black Son, has already arrived. Gingka, King, Yuki, Masaune and Madoka make it inside the temple and battles begin.

32.title: Come Together, Legendary Bladers!
32.plot: Gingka defeats Chris in battle but convinces Chris that as a Legendary Blader, Chris is part of a team and not alone anymore. Aguma is defeated by Tithi and Dynamis gets Aguma to go with him and follow Gingka and the others. Gingka arrives at the Temple of Nemesis where he meets up with Pluto, Rago and to his surprise, Doji.

33.title: Diablo Nemesis
33.plot: In a temple in Mexico, Rago battles all comers including Gingka and his friends and Ryuga and none of their beys have any effect on Rago's Diablo Nemesis as it sends them all flying Pegasus. Before Gingka and the others can decide on their next move, Rago uses the power of Diablo Nemesis to destroy the temple.

34.title: To the Final Battle Ground
34.plot: While the WBBA and all its members are searching the world for signs of Rago and Nemesis, Gingka and his friends are training hard for the battle they know is ahead of them. Meanwhile, Rago, Doji and Pluto are on a boat in the middle of the ocean, attempting to raise the sunken Kingdom of King Hades.

35.title: The Lost Kingdom
35.plot: Gingka and his friends fly towards the location of Nemesis in the Pacific Ocean, but the helicopter they are travelling in hits a vicious storm. They are forced to land on a deserted island and use boats to get to the Lost Kingdom of King Hades where they believe Nemesis is located.

36.title: The Missing Star of the Four Seasons
36.plot: Gingka and his friends try to help Ryuga who has been badly hurt in a battle with Rago, but it appears they are too late to save him. With Ryuga gone, Dynamis tells them that it means that Zeus barrier cannot be completed and now they cannot depend on any help from Mother Earth, they are on their own.

37.title: Flash Sagittario
37.plot: Kenta and his newly evolved bey, Flash Sagittario, battle head to head with Rago and his bey, Diablo Nemesis. Gingka is convinced that Kenta has been given the powers of the summer constellation legendary Blader from Ryuga. The others agree and a new attempt to create the Barrier of Zeus begins as they try to seal up the God of Destruction.

38.title: Hades Persistence
38.plot: Gingka and the rest of the Four Season Legendary Bladers appear to complete Zeus' Barrier and seal Nemesis away for good, along with Rago and Pluto who are carried down with the destruction of the Lost Kingdom of Hades. Their celebration is short lived though as through a crack in Zeus' Barrier, the God of Destruction appears and is determined to destroy the earth.

39.title: A Ray of Hope
39.plot: Gingka has received the power of all his friends' beys and he and Pegasus are in a head to head battle with Nemesis.

43.title: Shikumareta kaado
43.plot: Benkei battles his idol Kyoya and loses; Gingka beats Ryutaro but celebrations are cut short when they are visited by the wounded Yu.

23.title: Entering the Trap
23.plot: Yu recovers from his injuries in time to battle Enso Garcia in the first match of the finals, but he and his damaged Libra lose. Masamune defeats Enso in the next match, but then loses to Enso's sister, Selen.

26.title: The Bridge to the Future
26.plot:

imdb.title: Beyblade: Metal Fusion
plot: The story of a teenager and his quest to become the best blader in the world.
